titleStmt.title: England's joy for the taking off the chimney=money, or, The nations hearty thanks for their Majesties royal clemency

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for A. Melbourn and sold by R. Hayhurst,

notesStmt.note: "Tune of, Hey boys up gh [sic] we. Licensed, and entred according to order."

Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
